((Sorry I meant to say I. Wouldn't talk about anyone's leadership in or out 
of character code the only people that have the right to bitch about that are 
the people that did or doing the job now and as I remember your solo 
adventure kind got your tail kicked so. "The teapot can't talk about the 
kettle because there both cracked."))

Dark Convoy looks at scanners "Here he comes computer send out 3 low level 
attack Drones" 

Computer sending 3 Air Drones at  target acquired 

Dark Convoy looks at screen "pull up a Visual"

As three Small a robots transform into small planes and take off flying due 
east.

::Due east::

Lio looks at 3 small dots on the Horizon "what in Hell? What in the world is 
that there not missiles or online defenses would have warned me."

Drones open laser Fire.

Lio sees a blue beam whizz past him as Lio streams under the 3 Drones he 
rolls onto his "Target 3 Command Line auto lock" Three red laser extend form 
his forearm cannon each locking on one of the drones. Liono Fires 3 shots at 
the drones that fly   up on line with the laser hitting and destroying all 3 
drones.

Dark Convoy Laughs "o my  he has improved Computer open bay doors lets see 
how he handles this." As the bay doors slowly open Dark opens his hands 
creating 2 Plasma ball "Lets see if he can counter my blitz Balls. Lets the 2 
Plasma seekers go  and they shoot off after lio.
